dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So the joint inspection at the Nur Zholy and Khorgos border checkpoints, that's a pretty significant move, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So the joint inspection at the Nur Zholy and Khorgos border checkpoints, that's a pretty significant move, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Delegations from Kazakhstan and China conducted a joint inspection at the "Nur Zholy" " "Khorgos" border checkpoints.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. And the numbers they're sharing are just staggeringâ€”border capacity went from 202,000 vehicles in 2023 all the way up to 734,000 this year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. And the numbers they're sharing are just staggering-border capacity went from two hundred two thousand vehicles in twenty twenty three all the way up to seven hundred thirty four thousand this year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to SRC, border capacity with China rose from 202,000 vehicles in 2023 to 429,000, and to 734,000 in 2024.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's a huge jump. And it sounds like Minister Sun Meijun was really impressed with the electronic queue system there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's a huge jump. And it sounds like Minister Sun Meijun was really impressed with the electronic queue system there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Minister Sun Meijun praised the infrastructure at "Nur Zholy" and highlighted the convenience of the electronic queue system.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Mhm, he specifically praised the infrastructure. You know, anything that cuts down on wait times is gonna be a win for trade.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mhm, he specifically praised the infrastructure. You know, anything that cuts down on wait times is gonna be a win for trade.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Minister Sun Meijun praised the infrastructure at "Nur Zholy" and highlighted the convenience of the electronic queue system.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And with 238,500 vehicles already in just the first four months of 2025, that's a 41% increase. That's not small.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And with two hundred thirty eight thousand, five hundred vehicles already in just the first four months of twenty twenty five, that's a forty one percent increase. That's not small.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the first four months of 2025, 238,500 vehicles have already crossed the border " a 41% increase.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And this was all part of fulfilling the President's instructions to tackle that congestion issue. Smart move, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And this was all part of fulfilling the President's instructions to tackle that congestion issue. Smart move, honestly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The visit took place as part of efforts to fulfill the President's instructions and resolve border congestion issues at the China entry point.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and having Zhandos Duysembiev leading the Kazakh delegation shows how seriously they're taking it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and having Zhandos Duysembiev leading the Kazakh delegation shows how seriously they're taking it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Kazakh delegation was led by SRC Chairman Zhandos Duysembiev, while the Chinese side was headed by Minister of the General Administration of Customs Sun Meijun.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. I mean, reducing queues means smoother transit, which obviously boosts bilateral trade. It's a no-brainer.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. I mean, reducing queues means smoother transit, which obviously boosts bilateral trade. It's a no-brainer.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The measures are expected to reduce queues and boost transit and bilateral trade volumes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And you know, uh, when both sides agree to increase throughput like this, it signals real cooperation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And you know, uh, when both sides agree to increase throughput like this, it signals real cooperation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The two sides agreed to increase border throughput, according to the press service of Kazakhstan's State Revenue Committee (SRC).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It does. And given how crucial that border is for land trade between China and Central Asia, these improvements are long overdue.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It does. And given how crucial that border is for land trade between China and Central Asia, these improvements are long overdue.

dialogue_turns.text: Totally. I'm curious to see how this plays out over the rest of the year, especially with those early numbers looking so strong.
